Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky black (fired red); edge of foot white; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 369 is written in pencil on the interior surface of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1149) (phase 2)
